title: How to view completed tasks
content: How do I view completed tasks. I've tried View > Tasks > Completed Tasks & View > Tasks > All, but either way only uncompleted tasks are shown.
creator: chris270

title: message recall
content: Want to recall a message sent today. Is there a way to do that?
creator: brutoviejo1

title: failed installation of Thunderbird on Windows 11
content: on Windows 11, my installation of Thunderbird was only partially successful. I created my own installation path, as permitted by the Thunderbird installation instruction which included a "Local Folders" folder as a placeholder for all of my wife mail folders. But after copying all of her mail folder to C:Program Files\Mozilla Thunderbird\Local Folders - Thunderbird can't find them . The installation app gave no warning of impending doom. Any ideas about what might have gone wrong? I installed Thunderbird several times into slightly different paths - but not the default because I do my own backups and need to know where my files are located. Even though I am the administrator of the system I also got some messages telling me I wasn't an authorized user. Thanks for any tips, ideas or even complete solutions are appreciated. Geoff Tennille
creator: gtennille

title: TB settings doesn't recognize my password
content: Even though I'm logged in on TB with my Mozilla pw, TB will not reveal my passwords in TB settings. I use @hotmail.com and there appears to be a problem with pop3 server, Microsoft and TB. I get a authentication failure and according to FAQs I need to delete my pw in TB and enter a new one. But can't get there to delete.
creator: rickesk

title: New columns appears (CB)
content:
What are these new columns which suddenly appeared? From (CB), Recipient (CB), and Correspondents (CB)

I've never used them and can't imagine allowing them to clog my message headings so I uncheck them when I find them.
creator: hlthenvt

title: I have not received any emails since 27 October 2024.
content: I have not received any emails since 27 October 2024. I have checked the settings and they are OK. Any ideas?
creator: grant.burford

title: Don't want to download all messages on TB
content:
Hi there,

I just installed TB recently. I have configured my Gmail account to be used on TB using IMAP. I am noticing that TB is downloading all my emails from my Gmail. I do not want this. I only want to see the header of the emails, and if I click on the email, then it can download it. I don't want TB to take up a lot of space on my laptop.

Do you have any suggestions on how I can do this? If this question has been answered earlier, a link to that post will be appreciated.
creator: thomas.sigy

title: Cannot acces email
content: Since moving to Windows 11 and reinstalling Thunderbird, I cannot access emails by this route. I have a domain hosted by Easily and can get to my emails directly through their Control Panel, but using the same email, password, ports etc through TB it fails to find the account. I have rechecked all the settings with Easily and tried several times entering them manually in TB, with the same result. What else can I do?
creator: RD10
